english.segment1: Jesus, I am through defending. This war's never ending inside me. I've been fighting not to forfeit. Trying not to trust in. Only you. But I can't get well. I can't get through. I can't get by. If I can't get you
english.segment3: Chorus: There's a white flag. Waving where my colors used to fly. You win. There's a white flag. Giving up and giving all of me " I give in. I'm Yours to reign and to rule. I'm just a fool. With a white flag
english.segment5: Jesus, now my fist is open. Now my sword is broken. I come in peace. Cause I can't get well. I can't get through. I can't get by. If I can't get you
english.segment6: Mercy, mercy. Give me mercy, mercy. Take me mercy, mercy. I am overcome, I am overcome. And here's my
english.segment8: White flag. Waving where my colors used to fly. You win. Here's my white flag. Giving up and giving all of me " I give in. I'm Yours to reign and to rule. I'm just a fool. With a white flag
